runs.comm: pitched up on off stump, he is right forward to defend
just over mid off, Kusal attacks a full delivery and just clears the fielder's jump
good length, left alone outside off
swings at a length delivery and underedges it behind square leg, Tahir scrambles across from fine leg to stop it from running into the rope
this has jagged in a long way, from just short of driving length, and Kusal is lucky not to have edged it, bounces well over the stumps
hurries into the pad and rolls away square
goes after a widish full one, is beaten with slight away movement
goes after a outswinger and is beaten again, but this is too wide
beaten by one that comes in with the angle from round the stumps now, just has a weak push outside the line
once more, now he pushes forward at a good length ball and it jags away to beat the edge
angles it in too much and it carries down leg
first time he's put bat to ball this over, leans half forward and defends a pitched up ball on off
this length delivery has gone screaming past short cover to the boundary, was in the air but comfortably in the gap, not much foot movement as he opens the face on the drive
beaten once more this over, Morkel has hands on his head, Kusal attacking another full delivery and not connecting
reaches for a wide one angled across and pats it to covers
comes forward and pushes it straight down the pitch, it hits the non-striker's stumps
Dilshan jumps out and swings hard but mistimes it to extra cover
short, he drags the pull in the air, there is deep square leg in place
hit on the thigh pad as it bounces from short of a good length, rolls away to third man
Dilshan tries the Dilscoop but misses and is annoyed with himself
Kusal falls to a wild slog, a bit too late you may say, it was always on the cards, and he has been lucky to have survived this long, point settles under the high mishit to a length delivery
a full toss on middle, but he works it straight to square leg
bouncer, sharp carry to the keeper who jumps to take it as batsman pulls head inside the line, Morkel's overstepped though
Chandimal makes good use of the free hit, it is angled into him, short of a length, and he heaves it over and in front of square leg
right forward to defend to extra cover and an early call of no
length ball, on off, worked towards mid on and midwicket runs around
shot, clean hit high over mid on, came forward and lifted the pitched up delivery with a big followthrough
he does not have any room on this short of a length ball but steers it down to third man
keeper goes up right away for caught behind, bowler joins in, this has kicked from short of a length, Chandimal has gone for the cut, umpire is unmoved
forward to block a length ball
no doubts about this one, and Tsotsobe is pumped up, Chandimal went to cut another bouncing delivery and the edge was healthy to the keeper this time, Tsotsobe has worked up some good pace this over
opens the face and runs a short of a length ball to third man, past the lone slip
shortish, into the body, Dilshan pulls, along the ground, to deep square leg
skiddy length ball first up on off, pushed to covers
tries to scoop one angled across, too far across really, misses it
not much width, but Dilshan cuts with quick hands down to third man
drives to extra cover, not much timing on the shot
tries the pull but is late on the shot and is beaten outside off
firm drive off the front foot to extra cover
stays in the crease and runs a length ball to point, also hit him outside
hits the pads right away a tossed up delivery but that is going down leg
flighted googly, nudged to square leg
leading edge now to cover as Sanga looks to work to the leg side
pushes a tossed up full delivery to midwicket
full outside the leg side, down the pads, and put away with a sweep past short fine leg, poor delivery
a wide tossed up ball now, Sanga slams it wide of the sweeper
pushes a length ball down the ground, had extra cover got to it running across, Sanga was in trouble, but it goes to mid off, who hits direct, and they get one more for the ricochet
cuts hard with quick hands but straight to point on the bounce
punches a good length ball to the sweeper
sharp short ball into the body, pulled in the air, but well short of fine leg
this was quick and short but Sanga has gone across and controlled the pull, hitting it into the ground through square leg
slower length ball worked to square leg
short and quick, pulled away to deep midwicket
dangerous, he rocked back to a flighted length delivery, it hardly got up and he was lucky not to play on
pushed to covers for a single
nice, he is drawn forward and pushes loosely at one that spins past the outside edge
overpitched, he carefully drives to extra cover this time
pushes off the front foot to cover for one
tries to sweep one bowled full from round the stumps, is hit on the pad

sharp catch, it is AB at long on, Dilshan stepped out and had a go, got it off the inner part of the bat, it was still travelling though, and it took a jump from AB, he grabbed it, teetered for a moment but recovered comfortably well inside the rope
length ball punched down to long on
comes in with the angle and is pushed back
pushed off the front foot, bowlers sprints to vacant midwicket and prevents the single
he skipped out, JP angled it in and Sanga just managed something on it to nudge to short fine leg
dropped, difficult chance to extra cover, Sanga reaches for a wide tossed up ball and drives in the air, JP leaps high, reaches it, but cannot hold on
full toss eased to long on
flighted googly, spins away from the left-hander now, is guided through point
full and quick down leg
comes forward to defend down the track
swats a full toss to long on
full, driven down to long off
too full to get under, mishits to the bowler
neat, drives intentionally high over extra cover and easily beats the sweeper
flat and shortish down the leg side, and Sanga helps it past short fine leg
quick and angled in outside off, Sanga pushes it away
worked off the pad through square leg
nudges to the leg side, but midwicket is quick to the ball and Mathews has to get back

huge appeal first ball in international cricket for caught behind, Sanga went after the cut and missed, keeper jumping around as well, nothing coming from the umpire, there was a sound as ball passed bat, Sanga is lucky to be there, difficult to pick that noise in the din of the crowd
and next ball he places a length delivery past backward point
opens the face and runs it behind point
worked down to long on
full delivery, he hits straight, too straight, and into the non-striker's stumps
nudged off the pad, it is worked softly enough to square leg for them to take two
drives straight to extra cover
gets forward and places the drive past extra cover this time
now then, Angelo has moved across and pushed this length delivery tamely back to the bowler, as soft as they come
what a game JP is having, Mendis sweeps first ball, flat in the air, and straight to Tahir at deep square leg
tossed up, defended, and Sanga survives the hat-trick ball without fuss
some flight outside off, cut to point
walks out and pushes to long on
full, driven to extra cover
reaches forward and pushes to long off
quick and wide, driven to the sweeper
it was a mighty decent over till now, but Sanga reaches for this full delivery around off and lifts it over the bowler
walks out and nudges to midwicket to get off strike, bowler goes after it
moves across and works to vacant midwicket again
comes out again, it is angled in full, and he awkwardly stabs it to long on
pushes off the back foot to long on
length ball straightening around off, pushed back to the bowler
he is walking out almost every ball, gets a bit of a leading edge and short extra cover dives to field
tossed up, he clears front leg and cracks it to long off
mishit off a full delivery falls short of long off
Sanga gets the boundary, makes room and launches this over extra cover, long off runs and dives, but he was never getting there
shout for lbw as Sanga misses the sweep, hit outside the line of off
a full toss, Sanga winds up and sweeps hard but straight to deep square leg

Thirimanne tries to clear him, but there is no getting past AB at long off, takes the ball with a short jump, and even though he is close to the rope, his balance is so good there is no danger of him falling back on it
mid off is up and Sanga has cleared front leg and mowed this length ball, to the man on the bounce
back of a length, on off, dropped behind point for one
beaten, 142 kph short of a length ball on the stumps, bounces over as Perera swings and misses
good length, on the pad, Thisara nudges it to midwicket
Sri Lanka has sunk deeper, and there is little time left to make it ashore now, Thisara has had a go at a length delivery, and skied it to extra cover
Sanga, meanwhile, shows some nerve to walk across, and ramp a full delivery on the stumps over short fine leg, took it from off and middle, was gone had he missed
hits a length ball straight to mid on
a dab and a miss outside off now to a length ball
a short ball now, Senanayake tries to pull, is hit on the glove and the ball drops onto the pitch
another one falls, Parnell bowls a slower length ball outside off, Senanayake moves across, looking for the ramp shot probably, tries to swat it away, and ends up edging it weakly to the keeper
backs away and has a go at a short of a length ball, but misses
one more wicket, Malinga slices a high full toss to point, and Parnell can't stop smiling
moves across and swings at a full ball, cannot beat midwicket
Sanga gets one away, slogs over midwicket, from outside off, for a one-bouncer four
and again, he's really taken to these ramp shots of late, walks across and lifts it comfortably over out of the reach of short fine leg, took it from outside off, what execution
tries the ramp again, but this is wider outside off, and he gets it along the ground to deep backward square leg, refuses the single
Sanga backs to leg and Morkel goes wide outside off, just inside the marker, and Sanga has no way of reaching that
full and wide outside off again, and Sanga half-heartedly wafts at it, misses, and South Africa have completed an incredible comeback
